Text: Ana María Francisca Adinolfi (known by her stage name, Violeta Rivas; born 4 October 1937) is an Argentine singer and actress, known for participating in the music program "El Club del Clan", along with Palito Ortega, Raúl Lavié, Johnny Tedesco and Chico Novarro.

Triplets:<Ana María Francisca Adinolfi
